description:
A boisterous soul with a heart of gold, Dennis can`t ignore anyone in need. After being exiled from the top-tier adventurer party, "The Silverwing Battalion", he finally pursues his lifelong dream of opening his own restaurant. Though combat isn`t his specialty, he wields the strongest cooking skills imaginable, honed during his time as one of Silverwing`s most formidable fighters. He`s known as the "Legendary Fried Rice Chef".
Source: Official page
name: Dennis
